docs.title: DloadBox Documentation
docs.text: Welcome to the official documentation for DloadBox.

docs.title: Quick Start Guide
docs.text:
1. Install DloadBox
  2. Add a Download via Web Interface
  3. Add a Download via Telegram Bot
  4. Manage Your Downloaded Files

docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
To install DloadBox, follow the steps below:

  1. Download the installation script: bash wget https://github.com/azolfagharj/DloadBox/releases/latest/download/dloadbox-installer.sh

  2. Grant execute permission to the script: bash chmod +x dloadbox-installer.sh

  3. Run the installation script: bash ./dloadbox-installer.sh

This script will automatically install the software.

docs.title: Add a Download via Telegram Bot
docs.text: With the Telegram bot integration, you can add downloads directly from your mobile device or any device that has access to Telegram.

docs.title: Steps to Add a Download:
docs.text:
1. Start a chat with your DloadBox bot on Telegram.
  2. Send the download link of the file you wish to download to the bot.
  3. The bot will automatically add the download to the queue, and you will receive a confirmation message with the download's status.
  4. You can also track the download's progress via the web interface at the same time.

docs.title: Manage Your Downloaded Files
docs.text: DloadBox includes a File Browser feature that lets you manage the files you have downloaded. You can view, delete, or move files within the interface.

docs.title: Steps to Manage Files:
docs.text:
1. Access the File Browser from the web interface.
  2. Browse through your downloaded files and folders.
  3. You can perform the following actions:
  4. View: Preview files or open them.
  5. Delete: Remove files from the system.
  6. Move: Organize files into different directories.
